snippet: The trial in the Aurora theater shooting was delayed for the third time on Wednesday because a sanity evaluation of the defendant, James Holmes, will take more time than expected.
abstract: Trial in the Aurora, Colo, theater shooting is delayed for third time because a sanity evaluation of the defendant, James Holmes, will take more time than expected.
lead_paragraph: The trial in the Aurora theater shooting was delayed for the third time on Wednesday because a sanity evaluation of the defendant, James Holmes, will take more time than expected.

headline.main: Colorado: Trial in Theater Shooting Is Delayed
headline.print_headline: Colorado: Trial in Theater Shooting Delayed
